00250 inline int CVarIndex::GetProductVolume() const
00251 {
00252        int retVal = 1;
00253 
00254        int dimensionsCount = GetDimensionsCount();
00255 
00256        for (int i = 0; i < dimensionsCount; ++i){
00257               retVal *= GetAt(i);
00258        }
00259 
00260        return retVal;
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 inline int CVarIndex::GetMinDimensionsCount() const
00265 {
00266        int dimensionsCount = GetDimensionsCount();
00267 
00268        for (int i = dimensionsCount - 1; i >= 0; --i){
00269               if (GetAt(i) > 0){
00270                      return i + 1;
00271               }
00272        }
00273 
00274        return 0;
00275 }

00306 inline bool CVarIndex::operator<(const CVarIndex& index) const
00307 {
00308        int count = m_elements.size();
00309        int indexCount = index.m_elements.size();
00310        int commonSize = qMin(count, indexCount);
00311        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00312               int element = m_elements[i];
00313               int indexElement = index.m_elements[i];
00314               if (element != indexElement){
00315                      return element < indexElement;
00316               }
00317        }
00318 
00319        return count < indexCount;
00320 }
00321 
00322 
00323 inline bool CVarIndex::operator>(const CVarIndex& index) const
00324 {
00325        int count = m_elements.size();
00326        int indexCount = index.m_elements.size();
00327        int commonSize = qMin(count, indexCount);
00328        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00329               int element = m_elements[i];
00330               int indexElement = index.m_elements[i];
00331               if (element != indexElement){
00332                      return element > indexElement;
00333               }
00334        }
00335 
00336        return count > indexCount;
00337 }

00340 inline bool CVarIndex::operator<=(const CVarIndex& index) const

00347               int indexElement = index.m_elements[i];
00348               if (element != indexElement){
00349                      return element < indexElement;
00350               }
00351        }
00352 
00353        return count <= indexCount;

00357 inline bool CVarIndex::operator>=(const CVarIndex& index) const
00358 {
00359        int count = m_elements.size();
00360        int indexCount = index.m_elements.size();
00361        int commonSize = qMin(count, indexCount);
00362        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00363               int element = m_elements[i];
00364               int indexElement = index.m_elements[i];
00365               if (element != indexElement){
00366                      return element > indexElement;
00367               }
00368        }
00369 
00370        return count >= indexCount;
00371 }

00376 template <int Dimensions>
00377 CVarIndex::CVarIndex(const TIndex<Dimensions> index)
00378 :      m_elements(Dimensions)
00379 {
00380        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00381               m_elements[i] = index[i];
